about_the_game:
Sausage Hunter is an exciting platformer that takes you on an epic adventure with a kitten armed with a blaster. Your goal is to catch the magic sausage, which is also pursued by other cunning enemies. In this game, you will overcome numerous obstacles, solve clever puzzles, and battle hordes of enemies to achieve your ultimate goal.



The game offers many engaging levels with diverse and unique locations, each filled with challenging obstacles and puzzles. Hand-drawn graphics create a distinctive atmosphere and make each scene visually appealing. The musical accompaniment adds depth and enhances the overall gaming experience, making it even more captivating.

Key Features:

  • Hand-Drawn Graphics: Detailed and artistically rendered graphic elements that bring the game world to life.
  • Exciting Levels: Diverse and challenging levels that keep the gameplay fresh and engaging.
  • Epic Battles: Fights with numerous enemies, each possessing unique abilities and tactics.
  • Puzzles: Intriguing puzzles that add depth and challenge to the gameplay.
  • Immersive Soundtrack: Pleasant and fitting musical accompaniment that enhances the overall impression of the game.

name: Sausage Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 128 MB, Shader model 2.0. ATI X800, NVidia 6600 or better
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card Shader model 3.0. NVidia 7600, ATI X1600 or better
  • Storage: 110 MB available space

short_description: Help a kitten armed with a blaster catch the magic sausage! Overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and battle enemies in this thrilling platformer with hand-drawn graphics and pleasant music.
